home.name: Demo
home.long_descr: Hi! I'm a passionate full-stack developer with experience in a variety of web technologies. I love creating functional and well-designed applications that deliver outstanding user experiences. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technologies and working on open-source projects.

about.short_descr: Full-stack developer with a strong passion for clean design and well-structured code. I believe simplicity is the key to efficiency.
about.long_descr: I have been working in web development for several years, on projects ranging from enterprise applications to small experimental web apps. I like to build scalable, maintainable, and user-friendly solutions. I'm naturally curious and constantly strive to improve myself by learning new technologies and sharing knowledge with others. I love the feeling of watching an idea take shape line by line of code.

experience.long_descr: I had the opportunity to work for several companies using different technologies, from small startups to bigger companies. Each experience taught me something and I continuously improved in my learning journey.

list.title: Software Engineer
list.summary: Development of backend applications and REST services in a cloud environment.
list.description: Worked as a full-stack developer in an agile team, mainly focusing on designing and implementing microservices in Node.js and Python, integrating with PostgreSQL databases, and deploying on AWS.

list.title: Junior Developer
list.summary: Support in the development of management software and maintenance of legacy systems.
list.description: Participated in C++/MFC code refactoring projects, bug fixing, and development of new features for reporting modules. Collaborated with the QA team for functional testing.

list.title: Intern - Embedded Systems
list.summary: Internship on embedded systems and IoT device communication.
list.description: Designed and implemented a prototype based on ESP32 with MQTT communication for environmental parameter monitoring. Produced technical documentation and presented the project to the R&D department.

list.title: Freelance Consultant
list.summary: Consulting on software architectures and distributed system integration.
list.description: Analysis and development of middleware for communication between legacy applications and cloud platforms. Provided technical support for database migration and performance optimization.

skills.long_descr: I excel at breaking down complex problems into manageable tasks, which is essential for creating robust and maintainable code in large-scale projects. I’m driven by challenges and always seek opportunities to improve my skills. My self-taught approach allows me to quickly understand and adapt to new technologies independently.
